EmailTemplate.name: 1.5.1 Reminder of booked assessment
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Your assessment at NCS with The Challenge is on {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Owner_email__c}
Dear {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Candidate_Name__c},
This email is a reminder that you are booked to attend the following group assessment: {!HR_Event__c.Date_time_location__c}
Please contact us as soon as possible if you are not able to attend this assessment so that we can offer your place to another candidate.
Don't forget: - Prepare two icebreaker games/exercises to share with the group. The icebreakers should be no longer than 2 minutes and for a group size of 12. - Wear smart/casual comfortable clothing and appropriate footwear to undertake various group activities. - Please eat lunch before you come. There will be a short break mid-afternoon where we will supply drinks and biscuits. - Please allow sufficient time for your journey. If you are late it will be at our discretion if you are allowed to join the assessment on that day.
Click on the button below for directions to the assessment venue.
NCS with The Challenge is an equal opportunities employer. Please notify us of any disability that you have that may require reasonable adjustment on our part during the assessment.
We look forward to meeting you!
Best wishes,
{!HR_Event__c.OwnerFullName} {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Owner_email__c} {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Contact_Owner_Phone__c} NCS with The Challenge
CR 1.5.1
